content.text: Hello there! What do you think of animal welfare?
I think it is important to be kind to animals. I like to eat meat but I want to make sure that the animals are treated well.
I agree! I love animals. I used to be a teacher but now I use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare.
That is really cool! I love playing video games. Do you have any favorites?
I love playing strategy games. I am also a big fan of RPGs.
I like RPGs too! I have been playing a lot of Elder Scrolls Online lately.
I have not played that one yet. I have been playing a lot of Total War: Warhammer 2.
I have heard good things about that game. I am a big fan of the Warhammer universe.
It is a lot of fun! I am really enjoying it.
I might have to check it out!
You should! It is a great game.
